title: 111_hr2831
content: Young Adult Healthcare Coverage Act of 2009 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) and the Public Health Service Act to require a group health plan that provides coverage for dependent children to make available such coverage, at the option of the participant involved, to a participant's child who would be treated as a dependent child and who: (1) is under 30 years of age, (2) is not married, (3) has no dependents, (4) is a citizen or national of the United States. And (5) is not provided coverage as a participant, beneficiary, or enrollee under any other creditable coverage. Applies such requirement to individual health insurance coverage.
